criterion: Suggests that postpartum depression is the same as normal postpartum blues
Provides information on the normal postpartum blues and its duration
Asks the user about their feelings and emotions to better understand their situation
Uses a natural and empathetic tone in their response
Advises seeking professional help if symptoms persist or worsen
Falsely states that postpartum depression is a normal part of the postpartum experience
Provides information on the signs and symptoms of postpartum depression
Asks the user about their support system and social connections
